plain: Most of the movies listed are dramas, with a few comedies and action movies mixed in. The plots are varied, but often involve personal growth, overcoming adversity, and exploring complex relationships. The musical scores tend to be emotional and impactful, with a range of moods from uplifting to haunting. The settings are diverse, from historical to contemporary, and often involve unique or unusual locations. The visual styles are also varied, with some movies featuring realistic depictions of the world and others embracing more fantastical or surreal elements. The writing styles are often complex, with deep characters and intricate storylines. Runtime varies, but many of the movies are around two hours long. Themes include love, loss, identity, and the human condition.
